about_the_game:
Enjoy the thrilling investigation "Magic City Detective: Wrath of the Ocean DLC"! Hidden object games, Puzzles and brain teasers await you! Try to find all hidden objects in the extra locations!
This additional content includes four new locations! You'll get to visit the guest bedroom, as well as explore Ribeira's grimvagen, where you're sure to find something that can help your investigation! There's also a lot waiting for you in the main hall of the underwater palace and on the stage for Ribeira's rehearsals!

Uncover additional secrets, solve mysteries, and find hidden objects in a thrilling narrative that combines the allure of adventure with the challenge of detective work. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🏰 VISIT THE GUEST BEDROOM!
You can make a psychological profile of a person by the room they live in. And what if it's not a person at all? Here you can find peculiar things that will definitely help shed some light on the underwater world.

🏰 CHECK OUT RIBEYE'S GRIMWAGEN!
A grimvagen is the dream of many artists. A room where you can not only apply makeup, but also relax. You'll have to scrutinize everything to find even the slightest clue!

🏰 EXPLORE THE MAIN HALL OF THE UNDERWATER PALACE!
Have you ever dreamed of visiting the underwater world and finding a majestic palace? If not, here's your opportunity! You get to explore the main hall of the underwater world and marvel at its splendor!

🏰 COME TO THE STAGE TO REHEARSE!
Prepare yourself and stay vigilant as you navigate through the chaos and heaps of debris to locate what you need. Remain cautious, as the aggressiveness of the thief clearly indicates a dangerous situation!

Are you prepared to uncover all the meticulously hidden objects and solve the puzzles? Begin your adventure now and unlock all the achievements!
